definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the relation between fetal placenta product free estriol level and pregnancy outcome. Methods The free estriol was detected with immunofluorescence in pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎儿胎盘产物游离雌三醇水平与妊娠的关系。

sentences.english: RESULTS the best condition and operation method for the microbiological examination of Oestriol Suppository were determined.
sentences.chinese: 结果确定了雌三醇栓微生物限度检查的操作方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method to determine the related substances of estriol in its suppository by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立雌三醇栓中有关物质的检查方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the relation between fetal placenta product free estriol level and pregnancy outcome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎儿胎盘产物游离雌三醇水平与妊娠的关系。

sentences.english: An estrogenic hormone, C18H24O3, found in the urine during pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 雌三醇在怀孕妇女的尿中发现的一种雌激素。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The method can be used for quality control of estriol suppository .
sentences.chinese: 结论所用方法可有效的控制雌三醇栓剂中的有关物质。

definition: corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
